ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 347
ygData.msgSnippet: ... now ... Studded?  Studded?  You must have made this yourself because anyone trying to sell it would have been laughed out of Qeynos.  Last time I saw
ygData.messageBody:
> Message: 14
> Date: Fri, 17 Sep 1999 16:27:49 -0600
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> Subject: RE: Clerics
>
> With a str of 87 I'd be near max weight in small bronze. I'm at 68 lbs
now
> wearing studded, Crush tunic and barbed arms/legs. The dwarf is in full
> small bronze and weighs about 90 with weapons I think. Granted he's
> carrying a wepon that's heavier than mine, but only by 2.0 lbs.
>
> Kitasi

Studded? Studded? You must have made this yourself because anyone trying
to sell it would have been laughed out of Qeynos. Last time I saw someone
wearing studded was like 4 months ago.

You should ditch the studded. You should at least be in mesh, it has the
same AC and is much lighter. And get Banded Armor. Banded is only a point
or two less than bronze and it weights less. I banked the few bronze pieces
I had as they were too heavy. Banded with a few mesh pieces is much easier
to carry.

Once you upgrade from Studded, come back and tell us how your AC compares.
